description: Session initialization workflow. Takes user's project description, generates initial items across both tracks, deduplicates them, and builds the starting synthesis state.

phases.phase_description: Generate initial items for all IDEAS vectors (ARTICULATE, INVESTIGATE, RESOLVE) based on user's project description
phases.base_phase_description: Generate initial items for all IDEAS vectors based on user's project description

phases.phase_description: Generate initial items for all PROCESS vectors (DO, LEARN, DECIDE) based on user's project description
phases.base_phase_description: Generate initial items for all PROCESS vectors based on user's project description

phases.phase_description: Deduplicate and sharpen generated items within each vector, removing redundancies and improving clarity
phases.base_phase_description: Deduplicate and sharpen generated items within each vector, removing redundancies and improving clarity

phases.phase_description: Analyze the initial item set against the 15x15 strategy grids for both IDEAS and PROCESS tracks
phases.base_phase_description: Analyze the initial item set against the strategy grids for both IDEAS and PROCESS tracks

output_description: Fully initialized session with deduplicated items across both tracks and initial grid analysis
